sentences.en: At this time, a bowknot was adopted to be worn in lieu of the medal.
sentences.cn: 在这个时候，人们用蝴蝶结代替奖章。

sentences.en: He lay down here, drew straw over himself in lieu of blankets, and was soon absorbed in thinking.
sentences.cn: 他躺在这里，用稻草盖住自己，代替了毯子，很快就陷入了沉思。

sentences.en: They took cash in lieu of the prize they had won.
sentences.cn: 他们没有领奖品而是领了现金。
